widuli sandeshana niyamana komisame balapathrayak nomathiwa kalpitiya nagaraye welenda sankirnaye rahas kutiyaka nithi wirodhiwa pawathwa gena giya drawida madhya guwan widuli madhyasthanayak eeye (18) dahawal kalpitiya polisiya magin soya gena atha.‘shikharan’ hewath kandumuduna nam me guwan widuli sewayata ayath transmitarayak, shabda paripalana upakarana, adhibala antenawak, mayik dekak, hedfon dekak, laptop pariganakayak, si. di. thati 14 k, mudal rupiyal haradahasak samaga sakakaruwan dedeneku da polisiya magin ath adanguwata gena atha.me guwan widuli sewaya kalpitiya nagaraye kilomitara pahalowak durata wikashanaya sidu kara athi athara ef. em. (96.1 – 96.2) athara pramanaya siduwi atha.
